programme.desc: An Alaskan malamute exhibits aggressive tendencies; Cesar helps a professional dog walker with her clients.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A family's new Great Dane moves in on its other dog's territory; Cesar helps Los Angeles' animal-control department with its new pet-ownership program.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: TV personality Ed McMahon has an aggressive wheaten terrier; a beagle does not leave the house; an Australian shepherd is so territorial no one has visited his home in years.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A widow's retriever mix and two fox terriers do not get along; a Shar-Pei/Doberman mix drools excessively on car rides; Cesar revisits a Rottweiler mix.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: After a 45-day stint in Iraq and two hurricanes, an explosive-sniffing ATF Labrador retriever begins exhibiting severe symptoms of terror.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps an overly aggressive German shepherd and a timid rat terrier.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help bring peace to Jennifer Lee Pryor's home, where fights have been breaking out among foster dogs and her own four dogs; an aggressive beagle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Lab-greyhound mix has aggression problems; a Rhodesian Ridgeback-boxer mix has severe dog aggression.

programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier barks too much; a once-shy German shepherd becomes aggressive; a shepherd mix has a whining problem.

programme.desc: A German shepherd and Welsh corgi mix has dog aggression; a blind Lab chases his tail when he is around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A pit bull is aggressive toward strangers; a Rottweiler/Shar-Pei mix must get his aggression under control or be euthanized.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback/boxer mix's high energy develops into severe aggression; a couple's whippets bark and lunge at any dog that comes inside the boutique.

programme.desc: A border collie is overprotective of his owner; a German shepherd is aggressive toward other dogs and people.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd/pit bull mix with severe aggression issues; a boxer's owners are concerned by her tendency to jump the six-foot backyard fence.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a man get over a fear of dogs so he can finally fulfill his children's request to adopt one of their own.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.sub-title: My Life on the Dog List
programme.desc: Cesar helps actor and comedian Kathy Griffin with her two rescue dogs, Chance and Pom Pom, who are disobedient and territorial.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two troubled dogs, and their families, win sessions with Cesar after auditioning at a pet store in Orange County, Calif.
